intro.description: This tutorial guides you through the creation of your first review.

item.title: Open View
item.description: Select Window > Show View > AgileReview Explorer in the menubar. This step changes the perspective to set up the Review-Explorer on the left site.

item.title: Add new Review
item.description: With pressing the "+"-button in the Explorerview you can add your first review.

item.title: Select review
item.description: Before you can insert the review details you have to select the new review in the AgileReview-Explorer.

item.title: Insert Content
item.description: After creating the first review, you have to fill this with content. This is possible with the Review Detail view. Please insert your information.
